sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react' import './about.css' const AddFilm = () => { const [state,setState] = useState({ title:"", length:0, releaseDate:"2000-01-01", director:"", actors:[], pCo:"", genre:"", }); function handleSubmit() { alert(state.title + " " + state.length + " " + state.releaseDate +" " + state.director +" " + state.actors +" " + state.pCo +" " + state.genre +" " ); }; return (
setState({...state, title: ev.target.value})} placeholder="Film Title.." type="text" /> setState({...state, director: ev.target.value})} placeholder="Director Name.." type="text" />
setState({...state, pCo: ev.target.value})} placeholder="Production Company" type="email" /> setState({...state, genre: ev.target.value})} placeholder="Enter Genre.." type="text" />
setState({...state, releaseDate: ev.target.value})} placeholder="1990" type="date" min="1800-01-01" max="2025-01-01" name="date" id="date" /> { state.user.match("Production Company")? setState({...state, pCo: ev.target.value})} className="Reg-In-F" placeholder="Company Name.." type="text" /> :null } { state.user.match("Critic")? setState({...state, phNum: ev.target.value})} className="Reg-In-F" placeholder="0400123456" type="tel" /> :null }
) } export default AddFilm
